events.comment: When the data has been updated/fetched, clear the text object...
...and add a line of text for each score.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: When masked, the masked text is only visible through the mask.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: TextMasking
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow to use a sprite object to mask a text.

eventsFunctions.description: Defines a sprite as mask of a text.
eventsFunctions.name: Mask

eventsFunctions.description: Cancels masking of a text by a sprite.
eventsFunctions.name: Unmask

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a text is masked by a sprite.
eventsFunctions.name: IsMasked

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @arthuro555 and @Add00
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: InputValidation
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Provides conditions to check if a string is a valid phone number, url, email, number, contains only letters. Also provides expressions to manipulate strings (count number of lines, remove new lines, remove non alphanumerical characters).

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string is a valid phone number.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string is a valid phone number
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidPhoneNumber

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string is a valid URL.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string is a valid URL
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidUrl

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string is a valid email.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string is a valid email
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidEmail

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string represents a number (potentially with a minus sign and potentially with a decimal point).
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string represents a number
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidNumber

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string has only latin alphabet letters.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string has only latin alphabet letters
eventsFunctions.name: IsOnlyLetters

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the string without the first line.
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveFirstLine

parameters.description: String to remove the first line from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Count the number of lines in a string
eventsFunctions.name: CountNewLines

parameters.description: The text to count lines from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces every new line character with a space
eventsFunctions.fullName: Replace new lines by a space
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveNewLines

parameters.description: The text to remove new lines from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Remove any non-numerical and non A-Z characters.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remove any non-numerical and non A-Z characters
eventsFunctions.name: ToAlphanumerical
